item.title: Keepitem method : keeping the worst items?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_you21 i own you21
item.description:
@i_own_you21 wrote:

[code] }
public void resetKeepItem() {
keepItem = 0;
keepItem2 = 0;
keepItem3 = 0;
keepItemAmount = 0;
keepItemAmount2 = 0;
keepItemAmount3 = 0;
}

public void keepItem1() {
for(int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
int highest = 0;
int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(playerItems[i]-1, 0, i));
if(value > highest && playerItems[i]-1 != -1) {
highest = value;
keepItem = playerItems[i]-1;
keepItemAmount = playerItemsN[i];
}
}
}

public void keepItem2() {
for(int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
int highest = 0;
int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(playerItems[i]-1, 0, i));
if(value > highest && playerItems[i]-1 != keepItem && playerItems[i]-1 != -1) {
highest = value;
keepItem2 = playerItems[i]-1;
keepItemAmount2 = playerItemsN[i];
}
}
}

public void keepItem3() {
for(int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
int highest = 0;
int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(playerItems[i]-1, 0, i));
if(value > highest && playerItems[i]-1 != keepItem && playerItems[i]-1 != keepItem2 && playerItems[i]-1 != -1) {
highest = value;
keepItem3 = playerItems[i]-1;
keepItemAmount3 = playerItemsN[i];
}
}
}[/code]

try that 1 its in my server seems to work grate

item.title: Keepitem method : keeping the worst items?

item.description:
@delta wrote:

Here is the method

public void keepItem() { for(int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) { int highest = 0; int value = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(playerItems[i]-1, 0, i)); if(value > highest && playerItems[i]-1 != keepItem && playerItems[i]-1 != -1) { highest = value; keepItem = playerItems[i]-1; keepItemAmount = playerItemsN[i]; } } }

Something is wrong with this though. You keep the worst item you have
